Package controllers

Class AbstractController

java.lang.Object
controllers.AbstractController
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterfaceController
Direct Known Subclasses:
DrawController, ExampleController, ExitController, MainController, QuickController
public abstract class AbstractController
extends java.lang.Object
implements InterfaceController
AbstractController Implementing abstract functions that must be included using interface, but do not ned to be the definition provided.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Description copied from interface: InterfaceController
      Initialize. Implements the function, but abstracts the functionality. Must include the use of Platform.runLater(). This is needed to hold the data 'that is alive' within the running Thread and transfer it into memory, into a new object within the next running Thread so that the data can be accessed by the requested Scene.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface InterfaceController

    • runLater

      public void runLater()
      Description copied from interface: InterfaceController
      Run later. Utilises the ability to hold off the garbage collector with late code execution on a sleeper Thread.
      Specified by:
      runLater in interface InterfaceController

    • init_data

      public void init_data​(SceneData sd)
      Description copied from interface: InterfaceController
      Init data. The function that is used to unpack transferred generfied type T data from scene to scene into a specified HashMap.
      Specified by:
      init_data in interface InterfaceController
      Parameters:
      sd - the sd

    • move_window

      public void move_window​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      Description copied from interface: InterfaceController
      Move window. EventHandler implemented and abstracted out is now accessible to all JavaFX Objects allowing, multiple Scenes to be loaded and handled using a standard function.
      Specified by:
      move_window in interface InterfaceController
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - the io exception

    • loadAction

      public void loadAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Load action. Loading a Graph file into the in memory SceneData Type T and parsing this back onto the Scene using the SceneSwitcher Object.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event
